text: Which of the following must be true for the RFE (Return From Exception) instruction on a3 general purpose processor? 1. It must be a trap instruction I1. It must be a privileged instruction 11l. An exception cannot be allowed to occur during execution of an RFE instruction A.lonly B.Ilonly C.land Il only D. 1,1l and Il only gatecse-2008 co-and-architecture machine-instructions normal
